text: James Louis Ricks (1927 – 2011) was an American basketball player for the New York Rens. The entire team was inducted into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame in 1963. Ricks was one of the original members of the Rens. He would play with them from 1932 to 1936. ==See also== *Black Fives ==References== Category:New York Renaissance players Category:1927 births Category:2011 deaths
title: James “Pappy” Ricks
